page.title: 15HOME LIFE: A Day in the Life
page.content: On a{Saturday}my mum wakes me at 8 a.m., just as my father is going to work. He{tests water}for the Y.W.A. (Yorkshire Water Authority) to see if it is clean for us to{drink.}After breakfast, mum gets the car,{locks the {house}up so nobody can steal anything, and we go to{dancing class.}Later in the day, I play with my brother. When dad comes, we have tea:{chicken and {chips.}At 9 p.m. I go to bed. { { {Homes in Moldgreen} These are mainly{stone-built,}on average 44 years old. The present owner has lived in his house on average for 17 years. Only 2.2 people live on average in each house, because they are{mainly old people.}
